topics.body:
You know something I'm noticing about sonic boom that also makes it an extremely shitty Sonic game of all time?

The fact that so far I'm watching this game and for the first time ever we have a Sonic game wITH NO GOOD MUSIC.

Seriously what the hell?! What SONIC GAME HAS NO MUSIC!? 

Even Sonic 06 as bad as that game was HAD GOOD MUSIC. Same with Shadow too!
